item.description:
Member Diane http://www.meetup.com... is looking for people to join her for this fun event. If you are interested please contact her when you RSVP yes. There will also be another meetup group there as well.

Join Us As We Vote For The Best Signature Cocktail Of Newburyport
Enjoy Cocktail Tastings At Each Participating Restaurant , Great Goodie Bags And A Souvenir Shot Glass!

Event Passes $20 in advance/ $30 at door

Click Here To Buy Event Pass Now! http://www.drinkwater...

Participating Restaurants Include:


Michael’s Harborside- A Berry Berry Good Martini

The Thirsty Whale- Hawaiian Fruit Martini

The Grog- Plum Island- Tini

Ten Center Street- Apple Cider Martini

River Merrimac Bar And Grille- Carmel Apple Martini

Rock Fish- To be advised

Blu Water Café- Pineapple Ginger Margarita



Click Here To Purchase An Event Pass!

Rock Fish

Join Us At The Wrap Up Party For Great Music And Fun As We Announce The Winner Of The 2nd Annual Newburyport Cocktail Competition.

Hop A Ride With The Newburyport Pedi Cabs To The Event, During The Competition or Catch a Ride Home……..And Get A Raffle Ticket For Great Prizes !
item.how_to_find_us: Please contact member Diane if you are interested

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Newburyport Cocktail Competition
